fields.name: Copy_1_of_NoValidReferralText_0_0
fields.fieldText:
This patient does not have a valid Deposit Invoice and a reminder email will be sent to patient services to this effect.

﻿

fields.name: FETDetails_0
fields.fieldText: The below details have been automatically generated and will create a Transfer Event. Please check them for accuracy before proceeding.

fields.name: Day_1_Text
fields.fieldText: It looks like there is already a Day 1 for this cycle. If you reset it the system will delete all system generated results and re-add them.

fields.name: NoValidReferralText_0_0
fields.fieldText:
This patient does not have a valid Deposit Invoice and a reminder email will be sent to patient services to this effect.

﻿

fields.name: NoValidReferralText
fields.fieldText:
This patient does not have a valid referral and as such a day one cannot be entered.

﻿

fields.name: NoValidReferralText_0
fields.fieldText:
This patient does not have either a valid cycle consent or valid general consent and as such a day one cannot be entered.

﻿

fields.name: ExistingEPUText
fields.fieldText: An EPU has already been created for this Cycle. Please confirm that the details are correct before proceeding.

fields.name: Day28Warning
fields.fieldText:
This patient has a cycle that is less than 28 Days Old. Please see admin before proceeding.

﻿

textTemplates.name: invEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hi Patient Services, Please be advised a Day 1 has been logged, however the patient has an outstanding invoice; {!Get_Invoices.Name} with a total of {!Get_Invoices.Amount_Outstanding__c} outstanding.
Kind Regards, Compass System Admins.
